body.name: Dr. Talbot's Anti-Colic Silicone Bottle with Advanced Venting System and Slow Flow Soft Flex Nipple, Aqua Top, 5 oz, 2-Pack

features: ANTI-COLIC BOTTLES FOR BABIES 0+ MONTHS: Dr. Talbot’s Silicone Anti-Colic Bottles feature a venting system that helps reduce colic, spit-up, burping, and gas.
MADE OF SOFT SILICONE: The silicone bottle is squeezable, letting parents easily assist with feedings.

SELF-STERLIZING BOTTLES: The bottle’s venting system can be disassembled for a thorough clean. The self-sterilizing system utilizes the bottle’s components, water, and a microwave to make every feed a safe one.
SOFT FLEX SIMPLE LATCH NIPPLE: These soft silicone nipples have internal ridges that ensure the nipples don’t collapse during feeding and features a slow-flow design that is ideal for newborns.
BPA-FREE: Dr. Talbot’s Anti-Colic Bottles are made of BPA-free materials for parents’ peace of mind.
BABY REGISTRY MUST HAVE: Dr. Talbot’s offers products for feeding, baby-led weaning, soothing, homeopathic care, and nursery, boasting patented innovation in all its categories.
body.description: Less reflux means less fussing and more enjoyable feedings for parents and babies. Dr. Talbot’s Silicone Anti-Colic Bottle is made of soft silicone that is easy to squeeze, encouraging milk flow and assisting little ones during feeding. Dr. Talbot’s Silicone Anti-Colic Bottle has a venting system that draws air to the base of the bottle which helps reduce colic symptoms like wind, reflux, and fussing. The bottle features a Soft Flex Simple Latch Nipple designed to mimic mom’s nipple, encouraging latch-on. The nipples also have internal ridges that prevent the nipple from collapsing while baby is feeding. When feeding time is over, the bottle’s multi-part venting system can be fully removed for thorough cleaning. Sterilization is easy and convenient thanks to the bottle’s self-sterilizing system that uses only the bottle’s components, water, and a microwave. Dr. Talbot’s uses BPA-free materials for parents’ peace of mind.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎CLEANING: Disassemble all parts prior to washing. Boil nipples and wash bottles before using and after each subsequent use. Dishwasher safe (top rack only), or hand wash in warm water using mild liquid soap and rinse thoroughly with clean water. Dry thoroughly. Can be boiled; microwave steam sterilizer safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Aún no lo pruebo porque mi bebé aún no nace, pero me gustó mucho el material, se ve de buena calidad y vino en perfectas condiciones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gotta love the durability of these things!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Holy cow these can take a beating and keep on going!!!Kiddo has sent these flying many times lolBut they are super durable!!!At the same time, they are very grippy and easy for our little guy to hold onto (until he gets mad about something)They hold plenty of milk (or formula) and create a great seal. No leaks anywhere.Plenty of flow and minimal air that the baby gets, which is great!!!These are a great buy for parents!!They work great and they are tough!!Get these and you won't be sorry!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The overall look and feel I amazing. But the leakage from the filter setting on top of the bottle and not inside the ring of the bottle is not good..expect some leaks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these to try for my baby that was about 9 months at the time. They are nicely made, do not leak anywhere, and fairly easy to clean. However my baby wasn't crazy about the nipple and the flow was way too fast for his preference. That said, I don't think it's fair to give the product a bad review bc my baby is super picky about the nipple and flow rate. I think if you have a baby that is used to Tommy tippee or comotomo, or boon nursh, this would be a good option for a smoother, air reduced feeding bottle. I was able to use my comotomo adapter to pump directly into this from my Medela flange setup. However it wasn't perfect so I had to be mindful and not move around a lot for fear of bumping and disconnecting it. I actually found a sippy cup top and have been using it for my older toddler and she loves it! She loves that the bottle is silicone and "squishy" and i notice her using it as a self soothing method.My recommendation would be to make the silicone on the nipple alittle bit softer/squishier for the smaller bottles that would be being used for newborns to 3/4months, and maybe a little bit more of a gradual slope to the nipple instead of such a drastic difference from the nipple itself to the base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more colic
reviews.reviewText: These anti-colic bottles work very well. There’s no air getting in and a lot less tummy issues. They are easy to clean and store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bottle is made of silicone which makes it flexible and it has good grip to it. The bottle has an anti colic system. The inner part of the bottle has multiple parts which is can be hard to take it apart and put it back together to clean it between bottle feedings. The nipple seems to be soft but the suction on this is very slow. I think this will be great for breastfeeding moms, it will help them transition from bottle to breast without any issues. THe bottle is 5 oz so it will last for a few months. The bottom of the bottle is sturdy so the bottle wont tumble. The coolest thing about this bottle though is that this bottle is designed to sterlize in the microwave by putting all the items inside the bottle upside down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ll start by saying that we received a Dr. talbot’s bottle in our baby box from Amazon. So far that bottle and the nanobebe bottles we have are the only bottles my newborn accepts since she’s exclusively breast fed when we have to put breast milk in a bottle she refuses all other bottles. So It was a no brainer for us to purchase another Dr. Talkbot’s bottle. I was excited to open it this morning. BUT when I opened the Amazon package the box the bottle was in was tore open and smashed and the bottle itself was discolored. Our other Dr. Talbot’s bottle from Amazon was perfectly clear with zero discoloration. So being compared to that this new bottle is tinged a slight yellowy color. I’m super disappointed because we were very excited to have an extra bottle for the moments when it’s needed.Don’t get me wrong though, these bottles are THE BOMB! Just very disappointed in this delivery from Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are a game-changer for parents dealing with colicky babies. The advanced venting system helps reduce the amount of air your little one ingests while feeding, which can help minimize gas and colic symptoms. The silicone material is not only safe and durable but also easy to clean. The bottle's wide neck makes it a breeze to fill and the measurement markings are clear and easy to read. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip while feeding. Whether you're a new parent or have been through it before, Dr. Talbot's Anti-Colic Silicone Bottle is definitely worth considering to help make feeding time a little easier for you and your baby.
